content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 3, Valencia 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 3, Valencia 0.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Pablo Hernández.
Jonas (Valencia) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Daniel Sturridge (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Oriol Romeu.
Foul by John Obi Mikel (Chelsea).
Aritz Aduriz (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Raul Meireles (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Roberto Soldado (Valencia).
Foul by Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea).
Jeremy Mathieu (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match  (Valencia).
Substitution, Chelsea. Florent Malouda replaces Juan Mata.
Attempt saved. Pablo Hernández (Valencia) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jeremy Mathieu.
Attempt saved. Aritz Aduriz (Valencia) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Antonio Barragán with a cross.
Attempt missed. David Luiz (Chelsea) right footed shot from more than 40 yards on the right wing is high and wide to the right.
Substitution, Chelsea. Fernando Torres replaces Didier Drogba.
Substitution, Valencia. Daniel Parejo replaces Tino Costa.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Valencia 0. Didier Drogba (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Juan Mata with a through ball.
Raul Meireles (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Tino Costa (Valencia).
Attempt missed. Didier Drogba (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Daniel Sturridge following a fast break.
Víctor Ruiz (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Didier Drogba (Chelsea).
Tino Costa (Valencia) is shown the yellow card.
Juan Mata (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tino Costa (Valencia).
Attempt blocked. Tino Costa (Valencia) left footed shot from more than 35 yards is blocked. Assisted by Antonio Barragán.
Oriol Romeu (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Pablo Hernández (Valencia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Oriol Romeu (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. John Obi Mikel replaces Ramires.
Substitution, Valencia. Pablo Hernández replaces Sofiane Feghouli.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Ashley Cole.

Raul Meireles (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia).
Attempt missed. Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) left footed shot from outside the box is too high following a set piece situation.
Hand ball by Ashley Cole (Chelsea).
Substitution, Valencia. Aritz Aduriz replaces Jordi Alba.
Attempt saved. Daniel Sturridge (Chelsea) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Oriol Romeu.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Ramires.
